title: Whats up with key fragments?
body: So i havent played LoL in 4 months and now that im back and played a few matches i am not getting any key fragments but im still getting chests, has the whole system been changed? how do i get fragments now?

replies.body: Since the Honor Update, [**key fragments**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) have been more closely tied to your Honor Rank. They drop anytime you're on the client or when you login, but they come from simply playing games, staying honorable, and avoiding penalties/bans/dishonorable behavior.
